abstract: A wide-ranging surveillance operation by the Food and Drug Administration against a group of its own scientists secretly captured thousands of e-mails that the disgruntled scientists sent privately to members of Congress, lawyers, labor officials, journalists and even President Obama. Read more »

headline.main: F.D.A. Spied on E-Mails of Its Own Scientists
